name: DIY CD Case x 25 (pack of 27)
description: Sent blank and flat the DIY CD Case is ideal for screen printing or customising your next release however you want to. The cases are die cut/creased and available in three different card stocks, 315GSM manilla (original), 350GSM white and 375GSM black. They can be assembled in a variety of ways, sold as they are they can hold one CD, one CD and an insert or two CDs. They have been made to be able to house a CD tray which can be glued into the case, we’d recommend going with black or white trays available through ACDSleeve as clear trays will show glue residue. You could also use clear adhesive CD hubs. For more information, instructions and artwork template check out The DIY CD Case page. Cases sold before October 1st use a slightly different template, please get in touch if you need that for cases you have yet to use. Cases should arrive in 3-5 days from purchase or you can select the cases plus First Class postage from the drop down menu if you need them sooner (standard shipping is still added at the checkout at £4) For international orders and orders over 100 cases please get in touch with Tom at acdsleeve@gmail.com to sort out postage prices. If you wish to buy two or more different colours please email me BEFORE you order what breakdown you want, they’re sold in packs of 25 only. I'll then let you know what to order. For example if you want fifty white and fifty black it works out best for you to order 100 black (or white) but email me first with the breakdown so I don't send 100 black, this will save on postage for you and bring the cost per case down.

options.name: Pack of 25 Manilla (70p per case) plus First Class Postage
Pack of 25 Black (75p per case) plus First Class Postage
Pack of 25 White (75p per case) plus First Class Postage

name: Black/White CD Trays (25-100)
description:
The DIY CD Case was designed to house a CD tray, we only offer opaque black/white trays as it hides glue residue.

The trays are not are not self adhesive, they need to be glued into the case

We offer these cheaper than you could buy elsewhere.

You can order of 50 or 100 into an even split between white and black.

name: Clear adhesive CD hubs (25-100) / ACDSleeve Shirts
description: Clear adhesive CD hub to hold a CD on the case outer. This is the best price you'll find online for these quantities if purchasing with some DIY cases. Also available, is the ACDSleeve shirt seen here now only available in small and XL
